Title: Prohibits the recording of conveyances suspected of being fraudulent
Summary: Prohibits the recording of conveyances suspected of being fraudulent; requires the clerk or registrar to conduct an investigation into transactions suspected of being fraudulent and to report such investigations to the local law enforcement or sheriff's office.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law, in relation to prohibiting the recording of conveyances suspected to be fraudulent
